S

startReading(Identifier) - Method in class pl.pz1.problem.Library
Allows a reader to start reading in the library.
startWriting(Identifier) - Method in class pl.pz1.problem.Library
Allows a writer to start writing in the library.
stopReading(Identifier) - Method in class pl.pz1.problem.Library
Allows a reader to stop reading and releases the library for others.
stopWriting(Identifier) - Method in class pl.pz1.problem.Library
Allows a writer to stop writing and releases the library for others.
